name: The Dark Abyss
description:
Void the through the unknown of The Dark Abyss. A clown that lurks this town and haunts those who enter. Sucked by the darkness the only way out is to put the light back into him. Find all four objects and repair the light house and allow the town to return to how it was and continue on your journey.

This game is in early development and updates and problems will be fixed regularly. For any question, ideas or issues please comment and i will reply as soon as possible.
